example_utterances: No, it's okay. I already put some antiseptic cream on it.
I don't want it to get infected. Remember that time I got bitten and the bite swelled up?
Aww, that's sweet. I like when you call me that too.
I know what you mean. It's like our own little thing.
Oh yeah, I remember. You put some antiseptic cream on it for me.
Definitely. It's those little acts of kindness that really make a relationship strong.
And you do a great job at it. I feel so lucky to have you as my partner in life.
I don't understand why you need a new car when the one you have now works just fine.
Is that what this is about? You wanting to look good?
I understand that you've worked hard for your money, but maybe there are other things we could spend it on that would benefit us as a family.
